name: Deadline Soldier (Demo)
description:
Deadline Soldier

Deadline Soldier is first person horror survival game. Made in 1 week for the CFN Halloween gamejam 2017. Survive and find all key to complete all level.

Enjoy the game ;)

 ~ Cyberus Studio
Website: http://www.cyberusstudio.cf/

Controls:
W,A,S and D to move
F: Turn on/off flashlight
C: Action
LShift: Run (hold)
LCTRL: Crouch
Q or E: Peek Left/right

Please tell us if you found some bugs to: http://www.cyberusstudio.cf/p/bug-report.html
